h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Steel Ginseng Location
content: The Steel Ginseng can be obtained randomly from any Aged Ginseng plant throughout the game.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Steel_Ginseng.md', within the main section titled 'Steel Ginseng', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Steel Ginseng Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Steel Ginseng can be obtained randomly from any Aged Ginseng plant throughout the game.
